en.about_me_content: I graduated from Auckland University of Technology with a focus on Software Development. I studied Java, object-oriented programming, and agile development frameworks. I also independently learned C++, Arduino, C#, and Unity 2D for game development. During university, I mentored new computer science students as a peer mentor. I believe in continuous learning and improvement, which inspired me to create this website. Let's keep progressing.
en.updating: Thanks for your visiting, this project will continuously updating...

zh.about_me_content: 我毕业于奥克兰理工大学，主修软件开发。在大学期间深入的学习了Java和面向对象编程理论和团队开发的敏捷型开发框架。同时出于个人兴趣，我独立学习了C++ 与Arduino开发，还有使用C#和Unity 2D的游戏开发。此外，在大学期间曾任职于本学院作为Peer Mentor辅导计算机新生的编程作业。 科技行业不断的变化和升级，面对挑战、克服困难，是每一个程序员都要习惯的日常。保持积极的学习态度，不断提升自己，这是我创建这个网站的初衷。愿我们都能无限进步。
zh.updating: 感谢您的关注，我的项目仍在持续更新中...
